title: ChatGPT's AI coder Codex now lets you choose the best solution
summary: ChatGPT's Codex, which is an AI agent that lets you code and delegate programming tasks, is now testing a new feature that lets you choose the best solution. [...]

title: ChatGPT Search gets an upgrade as OpenAI takes aim at Google

title: Over 46,000 Grafana instances exposed to account takeover bug
summary: More than 46,000 internet-facing Grafana instances remain unpatched and exposed to a client-side open redirect vulnerability that allows executing a malicious plugin and account takeover. [...]
